feels.name: Jealousy
feels.quote: He was quite sure that Dorothea was the cause of Will’s return from Rome, and his determination to settle in the neighborhood; and he was penetrating enough to imagine that Dorothea had innocently encouraged this course.

causedByEvent.name: Dorothea's actions and interactions with Will Ladislaw

feels.name: Vindictiveness
feels.quote: To convince Carp of his mistake, so that he would have to eat his own words with a good deal of indigestion, would be an agreeable accident of triumphant authorship, which the prospect of living to future ages on earth and to all eternity in heaven could not exclude from contemplation.

feels.name: Suspicion
feels.quote: He was quite sure that Dorothea was the cause of Will’s return from Rome, and his determination to settle in the neighborhood; and he was penetrating enough to imagine that Dorothea had innocently encouraged this course.

causedByEvent.name: Dorothea's actions and interactions with Will Ladislaw

feels.name: Anxiety
feels.quote: He was certainly much revived; he had recovered all his usual power of work: the illness might have been mere fatigue, and there might still be twenty years of achievement before him, which would justify the thirty years of preparation.

causedByEvent.name: Concerns about his health and future

feels.name: Discontent
feels.quote: He was quite sure that Dorothea was the cause of Will’s return from Rome, and his determination to settle in the neighborhood; and he was penetrating enough to imagine that Dorothea had innocently encouraged this course.

causedByEvent.name: Dorothea's actions and interactions with Will Ladislaw
